H0.text: The world's deepest known cave is in which country. Russia

H1.text: The world's deepest known cave is in which country. Mexico

H2.text: The world's deepest known cave is in which country. China

H3.text: The world's deepest known cave is in which country. Georgia

A4.text: Kruber's Cave is located in the Gagra District of Abkhazia, a disputed region of Georgia.
